summary.title: New Threat Model
summary.description: An example of the TD threat model. Use the OdTMServer tool to fill it with threats

threats.title: AA01 Failure Of Remote Service (from flow 2)
threats.description: Unexpected failure of the remote service (because of flow 2)

threats.title: AA02 Connection Lost To Remote Service (from flow 2)
threats.description: Connection lost to the remote service (because of flow 2)

threats.title: AA03 Data Breach By Remote Service (from flow 2)
threats.description: Data breach (information disclosure) by the remote service (because of flow 2)

threats.title: AA04 Data Loss By Remote Service (from flow 2)
threats.description: Data loss (modification) by the remote service (because of flow 2)

threats.title: AA05 Spoofing Of Remote Service (from flow 2)
threats.description: Spoofing of the remote service (because of flow 2)

threats.title: AD01 Broken Authentication (from flow 1)
threats.description: No authentication or broken (weak) authentication by the cloud application (because of flow 1)

threats.title: AD02 Broken Access Control (from flow 1)
threats.description: No access control or broken (weak) access control by the cloud application (because of flow 1)

threats.title: AD03 Data Breach By Cloud Application (from flow 1)
threats.description: Data breach (information disclosure) by the cloud application (because of flow 1)

threats.title: AD04 Data Loss By Cloud Application (from flow 1)
threats.description: Data loss (modification) by the cloud application (because of flow 1)

threats.title: AD05 Backup Of CloudApplication Lost (from flow 1)
threats.description: Lost of cloud application backup (because of flow 1)

threats.title: AD06 Backups Of Cloud Application Stolen (from flow 1)
threats.description: Disclosure of cloud application backups (because of flow 1)

threats.title: AD07 Logs Of Cloud Application Lost (from flow 1)
threats.description: Lost of cloud application logs (because of flow 1)

threats.title: AD08 Logs Of Cloud Application Stolen (from flow 1)
threats.description: Disclosure of sensitive information from cloud application logs (because of flow 1)

threats.title: AE01 DDoS Attack To Cloud Application (from flow 1)
threats.description: DDoS/DoS attack against cloud application from the Internet (because of flow 1)

threats.title: AE02 EDoS Attack To Cloud Application (from flow 1)
threats.description: EDoS (Economic Denial of Service) attack against cloud application from the Internet (because of flow 1)

threats.title: AE03 Network Attacks To Cloud Application (from flow 1)
threats.description: Remote side can perform remote malicious activities based on misconfiguration or vulnerabilities of the cloud application (because of flow 1)

threats.title: AE04 Cloud Application Abuse (from flow 1)
threats.description: Malicious usage (abuse) of cloud application from the Internet (e.g. sending spam, participating botnet, mining) after gain control on it (because of flow 1)

threats.title: AE05 Block Shared Resources Of Cloud Application (from flow 1)
threats.description: Blocking shared resources of cloud application (e.g. shared external IP) by a third-part reputation service (because of flow 1)

threats.title: AE06 Disclosure Of Credentials Of Cloud Management Interface (from flow 1)
threats.description: Disclosure of user credentials of management interface of cloud application (because of flow 1)

threats.title: Generic DoS threat (from flow 2)
threats.description: A generic DoS threat (because of flow 2)

threats.title: Generic DoS threat (from flow 1)
threats.description: A generic DoS threat (because of flow 1)

threats.title: Generic elevation threat (from flow 2)
threats.description: A generic elevation threat (because of flow 2)

threats.title: Generic elevation threat (from flow 1)
threats.description: A generic elevation threat (because of flow 1)

threats.title: Generic information disclosure threat (from flow 2)
threats.description: A generic information disclosure threat (because of flow 2)

threats.title: Generic information disclosure threat (from flow 1)
threats.description: A generic information disclosure threat (because of flow 1)

threats.title: Generic repudiation threat (from flow 2)
threats.description: A generic repudiation threat (because of flow 2)

threats.title: Generic repudiation threat (from flow 1)
threats.description: A generic repudiation threat (because of flow 1)

threats.title: Generic spoofing threat (from flow 2)
threats.description: A generic spoofing threat (because of flow 2)

threats.title: Generic spoofing threat (from flow 1)
threats.description: A generic spoofing threat (because of flow 1)

threats.title: Generic tampering threat (from flow 2)
threats.description: A generic tampering threat (because of flow 2)

threats.title: Generic tampering threat (from flow 1)
threats.description: A generic tampering threat (because of flow 1)

threats.title: AB01 Failure Of Cloud Application (from flow 1)
threats.description: Unexpected failure of the cloud application (because of flow 1)

threats.title: AB02 Connection Lost To Cloud Application (from flow 1)
threats.description: Connection lost to the cloud application (because of flow 1)

threats.title: AC01 Malware From Cloud Application (from flow 1)
threats.description: Malicious content (malware) from the cloud application (because of flow 1)

threats.title: AC02 Public Network Access To Cloud Application (from flow 1)
threats.description: Remote user connects to the cloud application though a public network (e.g. Wi-Fi) and can be attacked by a third-party adversary (because of flow 1)

threats.title: AC03 Social Engineering Against Remote User (from flow 1)
threats.description: Remote user suffers from Social Engineering attacks, performed by third-party adversary (e.g. including the cloud application into phishing schema) (because of flow 1)

threats.title: Generic repudiation threat (from flow 1)
threats.description: A generic repudiation threat (because of flow 1)

threats.title: Generic spoofing threat (from flow 1)
threats.description: A generic spoofing threat (because of flow 1)

threats.description: A generic DoS threat

threats.description: A generic information disclosure threat

threats.description: A generic tampering threat
